Pattern Library

cookie notification component

< back to style guide

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • Fixed-position, z-index overlay banner that appears at the bottom of every page.
  • User is cookied so that once the close the banner they do not see the notice again for the rest of their session.
